entry.title: Recovery iPhone Recovery Password From Backup
entry.summary:
My wife forgot her restrictions pin on her iPhone and wouldn’t let me reset the phone because she didn’t want to loose anything. I found multiple tools that would help with this but they wanted $$ and I knew this was something I could figure out.

entry.title: Mono Project: I had no idea
entry.summary:
I usually prefer to blog about my own ideas and the learning process with new technologies. But when I read this article on InfoWorld I had to write about it.
What’s Mono?
